name: ZAGUAN
description: Repositorio Digital de la Universidad de Zaragoza (ZAGUAN) is a project aimed to handle all digital content at UZ in a single platform, so it can be found with a single search, but structured in smaller collections. The initial project, started in 2008, includes a collection of digital copies of rare books and manuscripts. Further developments: doctoral dissertations, e-books, pre-prints, articles, proceedings...
